name: PS-09-Crosspatterns-Abstraction
description: v4W.ENko - "PS-09-Crosspatterns-Abstraction". This grayscale liniar illustration is dedicated to the "Crosspatterns-Abstraction" - a standard parametric approach in designing 2d generative artworks . The "Voronoi" diagram is used to generate the layer of gray cells according to the re-parametrization of the "Substrate" pattern. "Voronoi" cells and "substrate" patterns are transformed in real-time. The "radius" parameter of the "voronoi diagram" is used to generate the offsets  number to concentrate the radials with the number of 14 using the "Gaussian" function.  this time the radial offsets are hidden to make the paths for the "white dots". The whole visualizations is forming abstract motion image. 925 cells / random seed 3453.  Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.
